mapper.sql: CODE, HEAD_IMG, CONTINUOUS_SIGN_IN_NUMBER, LAST_SIGN_IN_TIME, COURSE_NUMBER, LEARNING_TIME, E_NUMBER,ADDRESS, SUM_SIGN_IN_TIMES,ADDRESS,ADD_UP_E_NUMBER,ANONYMITY,PHONE_NUMBER,NAME,SEX,STATUS
mapper.insert: insert into TOM_USER_INFO (CODE, HEAD_IMG, CONTINUOUS_SIGN_IN_NUMBER, LAST_SIGN_IN_TIME, COURSE_NUMBER, LEARNING_TIME, E_NUMBER, SUM_SIGN_IN_TIMES, ADDRESS, ADD_UP_E_NUMBER,ANONYMITY) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{continuousSignInNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastSignInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{courseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{learningTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sumSignInTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addUpENumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{anonymity,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

CODE,
HEAD_IMG,
CONTINUOUS_SIGN_IN_NUMBER,
LAST_SIGN_IN_TIME,
COURSE_NUMBER,

E_NUMBER,

#{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{continuousSignInNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{lastSignInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update TOM_User_Info
HEAD_IMG = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTINUOUS_SIGN_IN_NUMBER = #{continuousSignInNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_SIGN_IN_TIME = #{lastSignInTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COURSE_NUMBER = #{courseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
e_Number = #{eNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUM_SIGN_IN_TIMES = #{sumSignInTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_UP_E_NUMBER = #{addUpENumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEARNING_TIME = #{learningTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANONYMITY = #{anonymity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from TOM_USER_INFO where 1=1
and CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from tom_user_info where E_NUMBER > #{eNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select count(*) from tom_user_info where cast(LEARNING_TIME as signed integer) >#{learningTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select count(*) from tom_user_info where E_NUMBER = #{0} and ADD_UP_E_NUMBER> #{1}
SELECT count(*) FROM TOM_USER_INFO u,Tom_emp s WHERE u.code=s.code

SELECT u.HEAD_IMG AS headImg, u.name AS name, u.E_NUMBER AS eNumber, u.code AS userId, s.deptname AS deptName, u.ADD_UP_E_NUMBER AS addUpEName FROM TOM_USER_INFO u ,Tom_emp s WHERE 1=1 AND u.code=s.code ORDER BY ADD_UP_E_NUMBER DESC
limit #{startNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{endNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert:
insert into TOM_USER_INFO (CODE, HEAD_IMG, CONTINUOUS_SIGN_IN_NUMBER, LAST_SIGN_IN_TIME, COURSE_NUMBER, LEARNING_TIME, E_NUMBER, SUM_SIGN_IN_TIMES,ADDRESS,ADD_UP_E_NUMBER,ANONYMITY,PHONE_NUMBER,NAME,SEX,STATUS)
select #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.continuousSignInNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.lastSignInTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.courseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.learningTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.eNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.sumSignInTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.addUpENumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.anonymity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.select:
SELECT CODE AS userId, E_NUMBER AS eCoin FROM TOM_USER_INFO where 1=1
and CODE=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update TOM_USER_INFO
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
